name: Jonathan's Adventure! 2
description:
"I regret nothing." -Joe Biden eating a hotdog.

Jonathan Is Back!

Jonathan and friends had a break of kicking ass across the world in their first adventure together. The break is broken by a major threat beyond them, but they will practice become stronger and defeat and save the world.

This is the exclusive demo of the sequel of Jonathan's Adventure! Better, greater and way more awesome like you've never seen it before.

Can you take on the world's new challenges?

Play on Newgrounds
